pr_title: [Java][JVM] Move java specific import mappers to JVM specific code gen

timeline.message: Move java specific import mappers to java specific code gen

timeline.bodyText: I think many of these are used by Kotlin, and maybe also Groovy. I think the TODO should have read JVM specific. I think the only Java specific ones are the joda time.
timeline.author: jimschubert

replies.bodyText: Updated for java, scala, kotlin, groovy
replies.author: agilob
